metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1746 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the Ansible Engine affecting Ansible Engine versions 2.7.x before 2.7.17 and 2.8.x before 2.8.11 and 2.9.x before 2.9.7 as well as Ansible Tower before and including versions 3.4.5 and 3.5.5 and 3.6.3 when the ldap_attr and ldap_entry community modules are used. The issue discloses the LDAP bind password to stdout or a log file if a playbook task is written using the bind_pw in the parameters field. The highest threat from this vulnerability is data confidentiality.

criterions.comment: ansible package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.9.7+dfsg-1').
